section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
The Association is a member of PensionsEurope. 
 
PensionsEurope's role is to develop a good EU framework that promotes workplace pensions in Europe and achieves good member outcomes. PensionsEurope works closely with the EU institutions and relevant stakeholders and is the only association that focuses exclusively on pensions. 
 
PensionsEurope has 23 Members in 16 EU Member States and 4 other countries. Together they provide pensions for about 80 million European citizens and own assets of around € 3.2 trillion.
goals__remit:
The Pensions and Lifetime Savings Association is the voice of workplace pensions and lifetime savingsin the UK. We speak for over 1,400 pension schemes that provide pensions for over 20 million people and have more than €1.100 billion of assets.  
 
We also have 400 members from businesses supporting the pensions sector.  
 
We aim to help everyone get more out of their retirement savings. To do this we spread best practice among our members, challenge regulation where it adds more cost than benefit and promote policies that add value for savers.
